verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Oh <S%H3863>that<s%> my <S%H3708>vexation<s%> were <S%H8254>but<s%> <S%H8254>weighed<s%>, And all my <S%H1942>calamity<s%> <S%H5375>laid<s%> <S%H3162>in<s%> the <S%H3976>balances<s%>!
For now it would be <S%H3513>heavier<s%> than the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>: Therefore have my <S%H1697>words<s%> been <S%H3886>rash<s%>.

For the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> are <S%H5978>within<s%> <S%H2534>me<s%>, The poison whereof my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> drinketh <S%H8354>up<s%>: The <S%H1161>terrors<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> do set themselves in array against <S%H6186>me<s%>.
Doth the wild <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H5101>bray<s%> when he hath <S%H1877>grass<s%>? Or <S%H1600>loweth<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> over his <S%H1098>fodder<s%>?
Can that which hath no <S%H8602>savor<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> without <S%H4417>salt<s%>? Or is <S%H3426>there<s%> any <S%H2940>taste<s%> in the <S%H7388>white<s%> of an <S%H2495>egg<s%>?
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3985>refuseth<s%> to <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H1741>them<s%>; They are as loathsome food to <S%H3899>me<s%>.
Oh that I might <S%H935>have<s%> my <S%H7596>request<s%>; And that <S%H433>God<s%> would <S%H5414>grant<s%> me the thing that I long <S%H8615>for<s%>!
Even that it would <S%H2974>please<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> to <S%H1792>crush<s%> <S%H5425>me<s%>; That he would let loose his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and cut me <S%H1214>off<s%>!

And be it still my <S%H5165>consolation<s%>, <S%H5539>Yea<s%>, let me exult in <S%H2427>pain<s%> that <S%H2550>spareth<s%> <S%H3582>not<s%>, That I have not denied the <S%H561>words<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>.
What is my <S%H3581>strength<s%>, that I should <S%H3176>wait<s%>? And what is mine <S%H7093>end<s%>, that I should <S%H5315>be<s%> <S%H748>patient<s%>?
Is my <S%H3581>strength<s%> the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>? Or is my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H5153>brass<s%>?
Is it not that I have no <S%H5833>help<s%> in <S%H8454>me<s%>, And that wisdom is driven quite from <S%H5080>me<s%>?

To him that is <S%H4523>ready<s%> to faint <S%H2617>kindness<s%> should be showed from his <S%H7453>friend<s%>; Even to him that <S%H5800>forsaketh<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>.
My <S%H251>brethren<s%> have dealt <S%H898>deceitfully<s%> as a <S%H5158>brook<s%>, As the <S%H650>channel<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> that pass <S%H5674>away<s%>;
Which are <S%H6937>black<s%> by reason of the <S%H7140>ice<s%>, And wherein the <S%H7950>snow<s%> hideth <S%H5956>itself<s%>:
What <S%H6256>time<s%> they wax <S%H2215>warm<s%>, they <S%H6789>vanish<s%>; When it is <S%H2527>hot<s%>, they are consumed <S%H1846>out<s%> of their <S%H4725>place<s%>.
The <S%H734>caravans<s%> that travel by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of them turn <S%H3943>aside<s%>; They <S%H5927>go<s%> up into the <S%H8414>waste<s%>, and <S%H6>perish<s%>.
The <S%H734>caravans<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> <S%H5027>looked<s%>, The <S%H1979>companies<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> waited for <S%H6960>them<s%>.
They were put to <S%H954>shame<s%> because they had <S%H982>hoped<s%>; They <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H2659>thither<s%>, and were confounded.
For now ye are <S%H7200>nothing<s%>; Ye see a <S%H2866>terror<s%>, and are <S%H3372>afraid<s%>.
Did I <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3051>Give<s%> unto <S%H3051>me<s%>? Or, Offer a present for me of your <S%H3581>substance<s%>?
Or <S%H4422><s%>, Deliver me from the <S%H6862>adversary<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>? <S%H6299>Or<s%>, Redeem me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6184>oppressors<s%>?
Teach <S%H3384><s%> <S%H2790>me<s%>, and I will hold my peace; And cause me to <S%H995>understand<s%> wherein I have <S%H7686>erred<s%>.
How <S%H4834>forcible<s%> are <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H3476>uprightness<s%>! But your <S%H3198>reproof<s%>, what doth it <S%H3198>reprove<s%>?
Do ye <S%H2803>think<s%> to <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%>, Seeing that the <S%H561>speeches<s%> of one that is <S%H2976>desperate<s%> are as <S%H7307>wind<s%>?
Yea <S%H5307><s%>, ye would cast lots upon the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, And make <S%H3738>merchandise<s%> of your <S%H7453>friend<s%>.
Now therefore be <S%H2974>pleased<s%> to <S%H6437>look<s%> upon <S%H6440>me<s%>; For surely I shall not lie to your <S%H3576>face<s%>.
Return <S%H7725><s%>, I pray <S%H5766>you<s%>, let there be no injustice; <S%H7725>Yea<s%>, return again, my cause is <S%H6664>righteous<s%>.
Is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H5766>injustice<s%> on my <S%H3956>tongue<s%>? Cannot my <S%H2441>taste<s%> <S%H995>discern<s%> mischievous <S%H1942>things<s%>?
